shape

Class AShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shape.AShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Composite, Oval, Rectangle

    public abstract class AShape
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class of all shapes
    Author:
    Xiang Zhou, Eleni Litsa
